reviewText: The product as expected came with no issues with the packaging or disc. The movie was bought for my family in which they enjoy anything Julia Roberts. So, all in all, it was a good deal.

Gift to replace favorite VCR tapes to DVD. Great price great deal 3 for 1. Hope to find more like this and it will make it more fun to give gifts. This product was as promised and delivered as promised. I will buy from them again.
It was a gift and was very well liked
This was a great stocking stuffer for my wife with three of her favorite films. The quality of each is great.
I love all of these movies! So glad I found this!
If it is Julia Roberts---its great!  And more wonderful when it is a triple!!
Love these movies and all on 1 DVD is great!!  This is a Julia Roberts Movie dream, all in 1.  :)

I love Julia Robers!  I have seen all her movies, and I wonder, why can someone make the whole collection together!  I have most of the movies, and play them again, and again...
Shipping was fast, and it arrived in excellent condition.
Julias movies are not only for women, everyone should see them, she is a great actress!
3 Classic Julia Roberts movies- Tres Awesomse.  The only thing that would have made it an ultimate must have would have been if it included Pretty Woman
Three good movies by Julia Roberts in one package.  This was a good deal for the money and made a nice Christmas gift for my daughter.
